message.content:
1. The study aimed to compare the effect of co-administered dexamethasone and diclofenac potassium with diclofenac potassium alone.
2. The comparison was based on the impact on postoperative pain.
3. The comparison also considered the effect on postoperative swelling.
4. The comparison further included the effect on postoperative trismus.
5. The study was conducted after the surgical removal of third molars.
6. Diclofenac potassium is referred to as diclofenac K in the study.
7. Dexamethasone was co-administered with diclofenac potassium in one of the treatments being compared.

messages.content:
Statement: The aim of the study was to compare the effect of co-administered dexamethasone and diclofenac potassium (diclofenac K) with diclofenac K alone on the postoperative pain, swelling and trismus after surgical removal of third molars.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
